section.title: Generate
section.paragraph: The directory <SRCSUBDIR>/generate/ of each src/ subdirectory is used by the afwdev generate subcommand to generate <SRCSUBDIR>/generated and a few other things.
Each of the subdirectories of generate/ is processed in a different way. The structure of the generate/ directory along with file to see for additional information follows:
section.code: generate/ |-- additional_includes/ # See generate_additional_includes.txt |-- additional_javascript/ # See generate_additional_javascript.txt |-- datatype_tests/ # See generate_datatype_tests.txt |-- ebnf/ # See generate_ebnf.txt |-- external/ # See generate_external.txt |-- function_tests/ # See generate_function_tests.txt |-- interfaces/ # See generate_interfaces.txt |-- manifest/ # See generate_manifest.txt |-- objects/ # See generate_objects.txt |-- _AdaptiveCollection_/ # See generate_objects__AdaptiveCollection_.txt |-- _AdaptiveDataTypeGenerate_/ # See generate_objects__AdaptiveDataTypeGenerate_ |-- _AdaptiveFunctionGenerate_/ # See generate_objects__AdaptiveFunctionGenerate_ |-- _AdaptiveObjectType_/ # See generate_objects__AdaptiveObjectType_ |-- _AdaptivePolymorphicFunction_/ # See generate_objects__AdaptivePolymorphicFunction_ |-- ... # See generate_objects.txt |-- polymorphic_functions/ # See generate_polymorphic_functions.txt |-- strings/ # See generate_strings.txt
